text: <Ænig> <þing> <wununge> <hæfde> <wyrcean>.

<Furðor> smeað <fandige> <God> se bið <þam> men þonne <hlædre> arerð & astihð þonne <uppan> <þære> <hlædrestæpum> oðþæt he upp <cymð> <&> <wyle> <buton> stapum <ufor> þonne <his> <stuntnysse> <mycclan> <wyrsan> fylle swa <he>.
Ongan næfre <almihtiga> fæder, ac he <wæs> <sunu> efre of him <acennedde> <al> swa mihtig swa he <wes> se <of> þam wisan fæder.
<Halga> <heora> begra lufe nes nefre <ac> wæs and æfre <bið> an God æfre <wunigende> on anre <godcundnysse> <undæledlice> on <anum> <mægenþrym> <anne> godcunnysse gelice <mihtige> nan lasse <þenne>.
Swa hwæt swa <lasse> bið þonne God þæt ne bið na God þæt þæt later bið <þone> God þæt hæfð <angin> <na> bið no God.
<God> nefð nan anginn ac <æfre> & <wunð> a on <ecnesse>.
<Sume> gesceafta swa <þurh> <God> <habbeð> <anginn> <endiað> & <forþam> ðe <hi> <nabbeð>.
<Syndon> <sume> hwile.
Þæt <&> <fugelas>.
<Wæron> <þurh> God & hi <nohte>.
Nu synd oþre gesceafta <gescapene> þurh God <anginn> & nabbað nænne ende <syndon> ece <on> <þan> <æftram> dæle.
Þæt syndon englas & eac menna <nafre> þeah ðe hi ær ongunnon.
Ne <mæg> <sawle> þeah ðe se <lichama> swelte oðþe he on wætere <wurþe> forbærned nefre geendian.
Ac heo bið æfre <yfel> beo god swa swa englas beoð æfre þurhwuniende on <ece> <worulde>.
<Ælmihtig> scyppend þe ealle þing gesceop ane swa <ece> þæt he <angin> næfð.
Ac hesylf is egðer ordfruma & ende <eallwealdend> <God>.
Ne ondræt he nenne forþan ðe nan oðer nis mihtigre þonne he ne furþan him gelic.
Efre he bið gefende his <gefa> þam ðe he <wyl> <þing> ne waniað ne he nanes ne behafað.
Efre he bið <ælmihtig> & efre he wyle wel.
<Nele> he næfre <nan> <ac> he <lufað> soðlice þaðe god <weorc> <wyrceð> <fordoð> <þe> <unleafulnysse>.
Mycel is se fæder & mycel <is> his wisdom <lufu>.

Locu þu nu georne þæt ðu swa swyðe ne <dwelie> þæt þu gedon <wylle> <sunu> læssan þonne his leofa fæder is oððe heora lufu be þinum <andgite> unmihtigran gemakian wylle ac þu ne miht swa þeah <ðu> swa <mycclum> <dwelige> gedon wylle þæt heora ænig unmihtigra <þonne> ælmihtig God.
<Wylt> þu furþor embe þæt smeagan <þone> <sylf> ne canst embe þe sylfne soðlice <smeagan>?
Sege me nu soðlice, miht ðu geseon þinne hricg oððe þinne hneccan þeah ðu lokie <underbæc> oððe þine agene saule, hu heo gesceapen is?
Ðu scealt gelyfan on <þone> lifigendan God & na ofer þine mæðe motian be him þe læs ðe þu dwelige swa swa to fela dydon þe ofer heora andgit embe þæt smeadan <butan> leafan & forði losedon.
God ælmihtig gesceopp ærest on <anginne> <heofen> & eorðan.
Her ge magon gehyran þæt heofen næs na ær ærðam se ælmihtiga wyrhta hi geworhte on anginne & <ealne> middaneard on his micclum cræfte.
Ac <wæs> æfre unbegunnen scyppend <swa> mihtiglice gemacode <cræft>.
Englas he geworhte on <wundorlicre> fægernysse & on mycelre <manega> þusenda ealle <lichamlic> lybbende on gaste.
<&> on <weorod> he gesceopp þære scinendra engla <se> fyrmesta on þam teoðan <flat> mid mycelre modinysse beon þam ælmihtigan gelic.
God hine geworhte <wundorlic> <ða> <sceolde> he gif he wolde wurðian his scyppend <mid> <mycel> eadmodnysse þe hine swa mærne gesceopp.
Ac he ne dyde na swa ac mid <dyrstigre> modignysse cwæð þæt he wolde wyrcean his cyneseld bufan Godes tunglum ofer ðæra wolcna heahnyssæ on ðam norðdæle & beon Gode gelic.
<Þa> forlet he <þone> ælmihtigan þe is eall soðfæstnyss & nolde habban his hlaforscipe ac wolde <beon> himsylf on hissylfes anwealde.
Þa næfde he nane fæstnunge ac feoll sona <adun> mid eallum þam englum þe æt his ræde wæron & hi wurdon awende to awyrgedum deoflum ða drecceað nu mancyn on ðissum middanearde.
& hi to ælcum yfele ælcne man tihtað þæt hi manna sawla mid synnum fordon for þam mycclum andan þe hi to mannum habbað.

God wolde ða gewyrcan mannan of eorðan þæt he geearnian sceolde mid his eadmodnysse and gehyrsumnysse þa heofonlican <winnan> þæt ðæra <engla> getæl eft worde gefylled & heora werod eft <ðæs> mannes ofspring forðan þe heora werod wæs <gewanod> <ðæra> deofla hryre þe heora Drihten forleton & of heofenum <helle> wite.
God þa gestaðolfæste & gestrangode his englas <þa> <forleton> þæt hi lybbað nu æfre buton ælcere synne or sorge on <bliss> <gehyrsume> on wuldre mid him.
& hi hine wurðiað to worulde mid <buton> ælcum geswince a on ecnysse.
God ða geworhte of ðære <mid> his halgum handum mannan to his ænlicnysse & ableow on his <liflicne> blæd & he wearð man geworht on lybbendre sawle.
God <sceop> him naman Adam & of his anum ribbe worhte him gemacan <wæs> Eua ure ealra modor.

& God hi ða gebletsode mid þissere, <wexað> & beoð gemenigfylde & gefyllað þa eorðan & habbað eow <ofer> þa eorðan & ofer <sæfyxum> & ofer þam fleogendum <fugelum> <eallum> þam nytenum þe styriað ofer eorðan.
On six dagum <swa> swa us secgað bec þa <menigfealdan> gesceafta gesewenlice <&> hesylf þa <gesceawade> ealle <þa> sceafta.
& hi wæron ætgædere <gude>.
Ða geendode <God> ealle <his> weorc on ðam seofoðam dæge & hine <on> ðam seofoðam dæge geswac his weorc.

Næs he na <werig> þeah ðe <hit> swa awriten si ne he mid ealle ne geswac þa <gesceafta> geedniwianne ac he geswac þæs dihtes þæs deoplican cræftes swa þæt he <syððan> scyppan nolde ac ða ilcan geedniwian oð ende þyssere <woruld> <ure> Hælend on his halgan godspelle cwæð,Pater meus usque modo <et> ego operorþæt is on englisc, min fæder wyrcð gyt oð þysne <andweardan> <&> ic eac wyrce.
Ælce geare byð orf acenned & mennisce menn to mannum <ðe> þa God gewyrcð swa swa he þa ærran geworhte.
Ac he ne gescypð nane <buton> þam cildum anum & ealle þa nytena nabbað nane sawle.
<Ælces> <mannes> sawle þe on his meder byð acucod gescypð se ælmihtiga <God>.
<He> Adames dyde swa lange swa mancynn & ðes middaneard wuniað & <nyten> næfð nane sawle.
Sume men wendon þæt ðeos woruld wære æfre <ælcum> anginne eall swa nu is heofen & eorðe & ealle gesceafta.
Ac <to> soðan þæt God.
<Sceop> & hi næron na gesceafta gyf hi <gesceap> <hisylfe> ac hi geworhte God.
Ælc þing hæfð angin <þurh> God butan se ana scyppend þe ealle ðing gesceop se næfð <ordfruman> ac hesylf is anginn & soðlice ordfruma eallra oðra <ungeendod>.

Næs hit na færlic geþoht oððe unforsceawod ræd <God> þisne middaneard gesceop ac wæs æfre æt fruman on his <ræde> þæt he wolde gewyrcan ealle þas woruld <ealne> middaneard mid his <mihte> himsylfum to lofe swa swa we geseoð nu <ealle> gesceafta heriað <scyppend> butan þam earmum mannum þe hine forseoð & hine herian <ne> gymað þæt hi mid þam <ealdan> deofle <endleaslice> <losiað>.
<Ure> scyppend þaða he geworhte Adam þone frumsceapenan man <syngian> wolde þurh ðæs deofles lare swa swa he dyde syðþan.
God <swylce> hu hesylf smeade ða iu embe þa bote hu he hit <gebetan> <ðurh> his halgan gife þæt he <gehulpe> þam <men> <eac> his <ofspryncge> <on> hine gelyfað & mid soðre <wurðiað>.
Se <man> wæs <he> syngian ne þorfte & he wære <gesælig> gif he na ne <syngode> & <æfre> <gif> he his Drihtne gehyrsumode.
& gif he syngode he wære <&> syðþan deadlic for ðære synne <fremminge>.
God hine ne <naðre> healfe ac lett hine habban his agenne cyre.

Næs <geworht> mid nanre wohnysse ne mid <nanum> synnum <gesceapen> to men ne nane leahtras on his life næron ac hæfde on his <anwealde> eall his agen gecynd buton geswince on gesælðe lybbende <nan> <gesceaft> næfre ne derode þa hwile þe he <hyrsumode> <scyppende> on riht.
God hi ða gebrohte binnon <Paradisum> þæt we <on> englisc Neorxnawang.

Þær wæs wynsum wunung & hi wunodon <swa> hale on lichaman & hæfdon ealles geweald ge heora agenes <on> eallum þingum buton eallum þam <dreccednyssum> <deriað> nu & ealre <þære> <myrhþe> þe ðær binnon wæs buton <treowes> þe <him> <forboden> <wæs> þæt hi on ðam anum bebode Gode <hyrsumodon>.
God cwæð to Adame, ne et ðu of þam treowe.
Gif <onbyrigst> þu bist sona deadlic.
Næs na se deað þurh Drihten <sceapen> ne on ðam treowe aweaxen ac <ðeah> þæt gif he tobræce þæt lytle bebod þæt he wære syðþan <dead> <swa> gesælig wære þæt he þæt eaðelice bebod eallunge geheolde.
On ælemiddan Paradisumlignum uitegehaten, þæt is, lifes <treow>.
<Adam> etan on ende æfter his gehyrsumnysse & habban þæt <heofonlican> wununge mid þam halgum englum.

Ða wæs þam <deofle> <awyrgedum> mode þæt se man sceolde þa myrhðe geearnian þe <his> upahefednysse & he mid mycclum andan þa menn þa <beswac> <æton> of þam forbodenan treowe & wæron þa deadlice & wið <scyldige> & hi cuðon þa ægðer ge yfel ge gud.
God hi ða adræfde <fram> þære myrhðe to mycclum geswinceum & hi on yrmðe <lif> syðþan.
Hi mihton þa syþþan seocnysse þrowian & hi biton <gnættas> & eac swylce flean & oðre gehwylce wyrmas & him <dracan> & næddran & þa <reðan> deor mihton derian his cynne <ær> arwurðodon swiðe.
Heora gecynd eac þa wæs on costnungum <gewylde> to rihtre wissuncge.

& seo galnyss weax unwilles on him <þeawas> þe he ær ne cuðe wunnon him ða on & on his cynne <syþþan> <moston> mid mycclum geswince þa godan þæawas þe God hi on <æfre> syþþan gif hi hi habban woldon þæt þæt hi ær heoldon <buton>.

Þærtoeacan hi swuncon & on swate leofedon & mid <earfoð> him ætes tiledon on mycelere geomerunge for heora <gymeleaste> <þe> uneað þæt hi ær wæron on ealre wynsumnysse & wunodon ða <anbidiende> deaþes & eall heora ofspring.

Se ælmihtiga God þa <engla> werod healdan þa gatu æt þam ingange into Paradysum & <þam> <bebead>, behealdað þæt Adam ne ete of þam treowe þe islignum uite<on> ecnysse, & him wæs swa forwyrned þæs inganges syþþan.
<Him> wære þæt he wurde þa ece & eallum his ofspryncge on ðære <yrmðe> <ealle> sceoldon on ecnysse swa lybban on eallum þam costnungum <þe> <cumað> nu & on eallum earfoðnyssum þe we on lybbað.
Ða <forwyrnde> <God> þæs <inganges> <to> þam lifes treowe þæt we lybban ne <sceoldon> <earmingas> <swylce> we nu syndon o þissum <sorhfullum>.

Well us <welwillenda> God þæt he on oðre wisan ure <yfel> <&> his mildheortnysse þæt he swa mycel yfell mihte gebetan <for> his wellwillendnysse us earmingas alysan fram þam <þæt> mihte he ana don forþamþe he is ælmihtig God.

Hit sægð <bec> & on þissere gesetnysse þæt ðær wæs ligen swurd gelogod æt þam <þam> halgum englum þe heoldon þæt geat & þæt ilce swurd wæs <awend> <þeah> forþanðe ure Hælend Crist þæs heofonlican Godes sunu <sextan> ylde þyssere worulde wearð to men geboren of þam <&> he mid his agenum deaðe þone deofol oferwann & he us <of> his laðum þeowdome.

& he of deaðæ aras on þam ðriddan dæge <swurd> of þam wege mid ealle þæt we in moton gan to þam upplican <þam> lifes treowe, þæt is <se> leofa Hælend þe þæt ece lif forgifð þam þe <&> mid weorcum cyþað þæt hi wilniað <his>.
Þis is <nu> betere þæt we on <blissum> <þonne> Adam þa <æte> <&> leofode on <ecnysse> <his> cynne swa swa we cwædon ær on eallum þam yrmðum ðe us on <eallum> þam costnungum þe us nu <ben> becumað.
Nu <þing> þam dysegan <dwollice> leofað þæt him genoh well si on <worulde> gif he lybban mot <æfre> ac he ne understent na his <agene> <stuntnysse> & nat þæt his lif on geswincum.

Ðonne him hingrað he <ytt> grædelice eft þonne him <drincð> gif he hæfð þonne him cæleð he cepð <him> hlywðe þonne him to <lyst> he gæð unþances ðider ðonne he werig bið he wyle hine restan gif he gewundod bið he gewilnað læcedomes.
Nis þis nu eall geswinc?
& gyt <swarran> <ealle> <ungelimp> þe on þissum life becumað þe man <earfoð> <ealle> areccan.

Uton we forði hogian her on þissum life þæt we mid geornfulnysse gewilnian æfre þæs beteran lifes on ðære ecean blisse mid urum Hælende Criste swa swa he us behaten hæfð se þe leofað & rixað mid his leofan fæder & þam halgan gaste on anre godcundnysse ana soð scyppend ealra ðinga, Amen.
